narrative.narrative: CAL Cargo Airlines is based at Tel Aviv,Israel and has a hub a Liege,Belgium. It was founded in 1976 and has as of September 2014 three destinations outside its hubs. New York JFK, Larnaca in Cyprus and Moncton in New Brunswick,Canada. Until 1999 it leased planes from El Al. They carry 100,000 tons of cargo a year. They do scheduled and charter cargo services, and carry some special cargo like pharmaceuticals and live animals and perishable's and fine art and oversize/overweight cargo to name some. They had as of 2014 two 747-400F's, which one may be an ERF.
